Elevate
YOUR PRIVATE EVENT
Celebrate life’s milestones, wins, and corporate events with breathtaking views of Florida’s Gulf Coast at Vue on 30a.
CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR
WE ACCOMODATE ANY
Occasion
CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR
Corporate Dinner
Showers
Birthday Parties
Special Occasions
Holiday Parties
CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR
PLAN YOUR EVENT
Your Way
Indoors, our expansive floor-to-ceiling windows capture every breathtaking sunset, while outdoors, the gentle ocean breeze adds a touch of magic to your special event. With its sleek, contemporary design and warm, inviting ambiance, Vue sets the stage for moments you and your guests won’t soon forget.
Our versatile venue can accommodate a range of event sizes, from corporate dinners to big celebrations, with seating for up to 180 guests. Whether you’re gathering for the holidays or throwing a birthday bash, Vue offers a truly one-of-a-kind experience.
West Wing + Terrace
PRIVATE EVENT
ACCOMMODATES 20 – 35 GUESTS
VIEW GALLERY
Full Club
PRIVATE EVENT
ACCOMMODATES 70-180 GUESTS
VIEW GALLERY
Board Room
PRIVATE EVENT

VIEW GALLERY
Testimonials
Perfect! Great food and service! We couldn't be more satisfied! Perfect for our small reception dinner!
emily
My wife and I dined twice at Vue on 30a during our recent visit to celebrate our 30th Anniversary. You, the entire staff and the food were incredible! We have told all our friends to make sure to dine with you during their upcoming visits.
Eric
The food and service were fantastic and the venue is classy and gorgeous. There were several options for the ceremony/cocktail hour/reception, all right on the beach with an amazing view. They did a great job in making our wedding unforgettable for everyone that was there.
Amanda
Great food and service. The vue is spectacular. Reservations are recommended. We went at 2pm and had no crowd problems. Got busy later that night.
Previous
Next
